alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Fulton; Izard; Marion; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 1:17AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Stone, east central Searcy, central Izard, southeastern Marion, western Fulton and Baxter Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 117 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Gainesville to near Briarcliff to 7 miles north of Thola. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Melbourne... Salem in Fulton County... Calico Rock... Oxford... Norfork... Salesville... Viola... Pineville... Briarcliff... Bexar... Flint Springs... Ott... Sturkie... Wideman... Lone Star... Herron... Colfax... Byron... Herpel... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Fulton; Izard; Marion; Stone
